1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Kurz that:The Messenger of Allah said: "The urine of a boy should be sprinkled over and the urine of a girl should be washed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بَوْلِ الصَّبِيِّ الَّذِي لَمْ يَطْعَمْ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the urine of an infant boy who is not yet eating solid food
